DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , randomize , comparative , phase III study evaluate safety efficacy Crinone 8 % comparison progesterone 60 mg intramuscular ( i.m . ) administer day luteal phase support 200 Chinese female subject undergo IVF/ET .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Using Micronised Progesterone ( CrinoneÂ® 8 % ) Luteal Phase Support Women Undergoing Vitro Fertilisation ( IVF ) Embryo Transfer ( ET )
DOC.detailed_description: This open-label , randomize , comparative , multicentric , phase III study evaluate safety efficacy Crinone 8 % comparison progesterone 60 mg intramuscular administer day luteal phase support Chinese female subject undergo IVF/ET . The study plan enroll 200 female subject underwent pituitary down-regulation per center 's normal practice prior stimulation multiple follicular development . The progesterone administration start day ET . Randomisation perform day ET . If pregnancy confirm day 14 progesterone administration , progesterone continue another 45 day . The subject follow treatment outcome ( negative pregnancy test pregnancy ) record .
DOC.criteria: Patient give write informed consent BMI < 25 kg/m2 Age < 36 year < 3 prior ART cycle ( IVF , ICSI relate procedure ) Infertility Regular spontaneous ovulatory menstrual cycle Habitual abortion Hydrosalpinges History past poor response COH Patients serious arterial , lung , hepatic renal disease Hepatic renal impairment
